postGameAnalysis.wasNormalVariance: This was an outlier for both Castellanos AND NC State defense. The defense that was allowing 300 yards per game suddenly held him to 203. Sometimes the worst defenses have their best games - variance is brutal.

closingLineValue.verdict: Slight positive CLV - market agreed this should hit. Sometimes the right bet loses.

keyTakeaways: Even 'worst defense in CFB' can have their best game - variance exists
150 yards of statistical cushion wasn't enough when defense showed up
Thesis was sound but execution by NC State defense was exceptional
Would still bet this again - 80% probability plays lose 20% of the time
verdict: This was a high confidence play that lost to variance. NC State's worst pass defense in CFB picked their final home game to play their best. The thesis was correct - Castellanos is productive against bad defenses. This was the 20% that loses.
